settings.title: PLANNING OUR FUTURE, WITH THE PLANET
settings.intro_text: Crafting a more sustainable future is our highest priority at MCM. Using innovation, smart design and future thinking we are proud to have set ourselves an ambitious path to meet the climate goals our planet needs. Our targets are grounded in climate science, guided by the Science Based Targets initiative, SBTi.
settings.commitment_text: At MCM we are committed to combating climate change and driving rapid emission reductions. The SBTi confirmed our targets are in line with the latest climate science to meet the 1.5C warming limit set by the Paris agreement, marking an important milestone on our journey towards a better future.
settings.target_1: - Reduce absolute scope 1 and 2 greenhouse gas (GHG) emissions 42% by 2030 from a 2021 base year.
settings.target_2: - Increase active annual sourcing of renewable electricity from 19% in 2021 to 100% by 2030.
settings.target_3: - Reduce scope 3 GHG emissions 25% by 2030 from a 2021 base year.
settings.closing_text: For all our SBTi goals, our ambition is not only to meet, but better these targets: to accelerate change, lower our impact, drive transparency and lead with best practice.
